name: TechCon 2023
description: Join us for TechCon 2023, the premier tech conference of the year. Explore the latest trends in technology and network with industry leaders.

name: CodeCampX
description: CodeCampX is the ultimate coding event for developers. Learn from experts, attend workshops, and level up your coding skills.

name: AI Summit 2023
description: The AI Summit 2023 is a free online conference focusing on artificial intelligence. Dive deep into AI innovations and applications.

name: Cybersecurity Expo
description: Enhance your cybersecurity knowledge at the Cybersecurity Expo. Discover the latest tools and strategies to protect your data.

name: WebDev World Conference
description: WebDev World Conference is a must-attend event for web developers. Learn about web technologies, frameworks, and best practices.

name: IoT Innovators Summit
description: Join us at the IoT Innovators Summit to explore the latest developments in the Internet of Things (IoT) and its impact on industries.
